title: 3rd Party Ban Bug?
body:
Another false ban here, over $2000 invested during 5 years (2011). 

Not here to plea my case; My account is crazy clean, no prior suspensions, yet it was picked up falsely. 

I've seen a few other posts just like mine today, with people that don't have clean accounts. I'm not worried about myself, but those few today may get banned from this false positive. Which is just deceptive and cruel. Do not punish your players for your errors

YOUR SYSTEM DOES HAVE A PROBLEM, PLEASE FIX IT.

Thanks pls thmb up^.^
~Votlon

replies.body: I'd take it up with the people you shared your account with / or paid for a boost. They usually use scripts.

When you're not to busy may you check out my forum i have serious question and i am in dire need for answers from authority but ofc please take your time. I just would like an answer, here is the forum http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/ebWsBPQs-trolling-banable

I heard on my forum page that you are good at looking over peoples problems with the tribunal. I know that this doesn't sound like something that you would normally think is important so I understand if it would take you awhile to see this but I really hope you can help me. My accounts name is "womanly legs" and I made a forum post, which you can find here,  http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation/0AvTTnAd-i-was-wrongly-banned-for-using-3rd-party-programs I just hope that you can help me.

> [{quoted}](name=AeroWaffle,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=E2IFFUAJ,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-01-31T05:53:49.147+0000)
>
> Unfortunately, at the end of the day, random users on the boards can't really tell if you're telling the truth or not. Your options are rather limited if Riot has decided that you have been using scripts. 
> 
> Any claim that you weren't using scripts can be seen as an attempt at deception in an effort to get your account back. Riot can't tell you what methods they used to determine you were using 3rd party applications in the interest of keeping these detection methods relevant. Which makes it extremely hard to prove their detection was incorrect.
> 
> Your best bet would be contacting support and telling them about any and all harmless 3rd party programs that may have been interacting with league.
Yeah... even I can tell from your match history that you shared your account....
